name: dev.vsnth.NanoIDGenerator
description: Generate NanoIDs on selected cells through context menu in TablePlus.

scripts.zip: mkdir -p temp_structure/NanoIDGenerator.tableplusplugin ../dist && cp ../README.md temp_structure/ && cp package.json nanoIdGenerator.js manifest.json temp_structure/NanoIDGenerator.tableplusplugin/ && cp ../LICENSE.md temp_structure/NanoIDGenerator.tableplusplugin/ && cd ./temp_structure && zip -r ../../dist/tableplus-nanoid-plugin.zip ./* && cd .. && rm -rf ./temp_structure
scripts.pack: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run zip
